ComicInfo.Summary:
Birthday Deathday: Cindy gets a spell book for her birthday.
Golden Anniversary: Nana explains why she and Pap-pap have been together so long.
Zombies vs. Cheerleaders Featuring the 3 Geeks: The 3 Geeks and some cheerleaders are trapped in a cabin surrounded by zombies.
